name: The Gravity Machine prototype demo 1.0.0
description:
The Gravity Machine's main mechanic is your ability to raise and lower the strength of gravity to overcome obstacles, defeat foes and interact with the game's environment. Almost the entire game will be designed around this mechanic.

It will be a steampunk adventure set in the year ####7/8 and have cool stuff such as giant robots.

Our protagonist is able to manipulate gravity because of a machine he spent a large portion of his life building.

If you are interested in seeing the final project please check out out youtube channel, twitter and website.

youtube: www.youtube.com/channel/UCCuqVBv1nzgC1hfxupeaZEQ?view_as=subscriber

twitter: www.twitter.com/GearAntique

website: not ready yet. ¯\_( ͠° ͟ʖ ͠° )_/¯

Email: antiquegearstudio@gmail.com

We are going to launch a kickstarter in a few months!

This is the prototype version. None of the art in this prototype will be used in the finished game.

Feedback is encouraged and thank you for your interest!

2018 Antique Gear Studio. 

www.youtube.com/watch?v=gZsCxizL2g4
